author: gstein
msg: Check in a bunch of work from the plane: basically a first pass at "update"
WARNING: it compiles, but is untested, and other stuff may have been broken.
end_element, get_attr, push_dir): buncha new stuff for updates
(MAKE_BUFFER): new macro for creating svn_string_t to be used as a buffer
* mod_dav_svn/merge.c (make_child_baton): make the baton in the correct
libsvn_repos/reporter.c; no need for this to be public.
(svn_repos_begin_report): new function to create a reporter baton.
* ra_plugin.c (do_update): replace a bunch of code with the new
* reporter.c (struct svn_repos_report_baton_t): new structure, copied from
(svn_repos_set_path): simplify the sanity check. eliminate a cast.
is the responsibility of the update process(!)
* libsvn_ra_dav/Makefile.am: add util.c and Expat includes
